languages.text: "Когда Неумирающий готов принять душу — направь ее в путь, ибо тело избавится от страданий плоти. Ты же решил{mf||а}... продлить страдания. Мне непонятен твой замысел".

"When the Undying One is ready to accept a soul, it must be sent forth, and so will it be freed from the torment of the flesh. Yet you have chosen to... prolong this one's suffering. Your intentions perplex me."
languages.original_text: "Когда Неумирающий готов принять душу — направь ее в путь, ибо тело избавится от страданий плоти. Ты же решил{mf||а}... продлить страдания. Мне непонятен твой замысел".

traits.locale_text: "When the Undying One is ready to accept a soul, it must be sent forth, and thus will it be freed from the torment of the flesh. Yet you have chosen to... prolong its suffering. Your design perplexes me."

"When the Undying One is ready to accept a soul, it must be sent forth, and so will it be freed from the torment of the flesh. Yet you have chosen to... prolong this one's suffering. Your intentions perplex me."

languages.text: « Quand l'Immortel est prêt à accepter une âme, elle doit lui être envoyée afin d'être libérée des tourments de la chair. Et pourtant, vous avez préféré... prolonger ses souffrances. Vos intentions me laissent perplexe. »
languages.original_text: "When the Undying One is ready to accept a soul, it must be sent forth, and so will it be freed from the torment of the flesh. Yet you have chosen to... prolong this one's suffering. Your intentions perplex me."

traits.locale_text: « Quand l'Immortel est prêt à accepter une âme, elle doit lui être envoyée afin d'être libérée des tourments de la chair. Et pourtant, vous avez préféré... prolonger ses souffrances. Vos intentions me laissent perplexe. »

languages.text: «Cuando el Inmortal está listo para aceptar un alma, hay que enviársela, librándola del tormento de la carne. Sin embargo, ha elegido... prolongar su sufrimiento. Sus intenciones me tienen confusa».
languages.original_text: "When the Undying One is ready to accept a soul, it must be sent forth, and so will it be freed from the torment of the flesh. Yet you have chosen to... prolong this one's suffering. Your intentions perplex me."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando el Inmortal está listo para aceptar un alma, hay que enviársela, librándola del tormento de la carne. Sin embargo, ha elegido... prolongar su sufrimiento. Sus intenciones me tienen confusa».

languages.text: 「不死の者が魂を受け入れる準備が整えば、魂を送り出さねばならない。そうすれば、肉体の苦しみから解放されるわ。けれど…あなたはこの人の苦しみを長く続かせることを選んだ。あなたの思惑はよく分からない」
languages.original_text: "When the Undying One is ready to accept a soul, it must be sent forth, and so will it be freed from the torment of the flesh. Yet you have chosen to... prolong this one's suffering. Your intentions perplex me."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者が魂を受け入れる準備が整えば、魂を送り出さねばならない。そうすれば、肉体の苦しみから解放されるわ。けれど…あなたはこの人の苦しみを長く続かせることを選んだ。あなたの思惑はよく分からない」

languages.text: “当不死之神准备好接受灵魂时，这个灵魂必须被送到彼岸，这样它才能从肉体的折磨中获得解脱。然而，你却选择……延长这个人的痛苦。你的选择让我困惑不已。”
languages.original_text: "When the Undying One is ready to accept a soul, it must be sent forth, and so will it be freed from the torment of the flesh. Yet you have chosen to... prolong this one's suffering. Your intentions perplex me."

traits.locale_text: “当不死之神准备好接受灵魂时，这个灵魂必须被送到彼岸，这样它才能从肉体的折磨中获得解脱。然而，你却选择……延长这个人的痛苦。你的选择让我困惑不已。”

languages.text: "Wenn der Todlose bereit ist, eine Seele anzunehmen, muss sie fortgeschickt und so von den Qual des Fleisches befreit werden. Dennoch habt Ihr beschlossen ... das Leid dieses Mannes zu verlängern. Eure Absichten verwirren mich."
languages.original_text: "When the Undying One is ready to accept a soul, it must be sent forth, and so will it be freed from the torment of the flesh. Yet you have chosen to... prolong this one's suffering. Your intentions perplex me."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn der Todlose bereit ist, eine Seele anzunehmen, muss sie fortgeschickt und so von den Qual des Fleisches befreit werden. Dennoch habt Ihr beschlossen ... das Leid dieses Mannes zu verlängern. Eure Absichten verwirren mich."

languages.text: "Ölmeyen'in bir ruhu huzuruna alacağı vakit o kimseyi yolcu etmek gerekir. Böylece etin eziyetinden kurtulur. Sense bu adamın ızdırabını uzatmayı seçtin. Niyetini anlayamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "When the Undying One is ready to accept a soul, it must be sent forth, and so will it be freed from the torment of the flesh. Yet you have chosen to... prolong this one's suffering. Your intentions perplex me."
